text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to cite GmbHG ยง47 as the legal basis for contractually establishing the investor's veto rights/Reserved Matters in the SHA. The response discusses the consent catalogue (veto rights) and mentions that for maximum protection, critical vetoes should be mirrored as Satzung provisions, which are voidable under a principle analogous to \u00a7 243 AktG. It also mentions \u00a7 53 GmbHG (supermajority threshold) and \u00a7 51a GmbHG (information rights).
